DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate effectiveness safety GENOUS EPC-coated stent patient STEMI drug-eluting stent ( DESs ) .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Effectiveness Safety GENOUS STENT ( IRIS-GENOUS STEMI )
DOC.detailed_description: This study non-randomized , prospective , open-label registry compare efficacy safety GENOUS stent STEMI patient other-type DESs .
DOC.criteria: STEMI Patients require primary PCI . The patient guardian agrees study protocol schedule clinical followup , provide informed , write consent , approve appropriate Institutional Review Board/Ethics Committee respective clinical site Patients mixture DESs Terminal illness life expectancy < 1 year Patients cardiogenic shock
